field.name: module_pretext
field.label: Module introduction text
field.description: The text that appares in between the title and the subscription form.

field.name: spacer_deoloc
field.label: --- Request Location ---
field.description: Request user to indicate his location

field.name: request_region
field.label: Request Region
field.description: Request user to indicate region (needs country)

field.name: request_province
field.label: Request Province
field.description: Request user to indicate province (needs country and region)

field.name: spacer_privacy
field.label: --- Request Privacy ---
field.description: Request user to accept privacy info/terms.

field.name: request_privacy
field.label: Request Privacy
field.description: Request user to accept privacy info/terms.

field.name: privacy_article_url
field.label: Privacy Page Url
field.description: The Url of the page to show to user. Leave it empty for no info.

field.name: spacer_welcome
field.label: --- Welcome Subscriber ---
field.description: Give a welcome message to subscriber

field.name: welcome_page_url
field.label: Welcome Page Url
field.description: The Url of the page you want to show after successful registration. Leave it empty for no welcome.

field.name: popup_welcome_page
field.label: Popup Welcome Page
field.description: Do you want the Welcome Page to be in a popup? Specified page will open in fancyboxed iframe.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: Additional css classes to assign to module.

field.name: load_jquery
field.label: Load jQuery
field.description: Auto is a safe choice here. jQuery library is needed for this module to work. However you might already have it included in your site by the template or by some other module/plugin. Do not load jQuery twice!

field.name: load_fancybox
field.label: Load jQuery Fancybox
field.description: Auto is a safe choice here. Load the jQuery Fancybox library. You will need this for fancy popups.
